department.en: Master of Science Program in Remote Sensing Science and Technology
department.ch: 遙測科技碩士學位學程

remark.ch: 本課程部分時數提前於1/15-1/19期間密集授課，實際上課時間，將以第一次上課授課教師宣布為準

goal.en: “This course will offer the principle of synthetic aperture radar, and its application on co-seismic and subsidence observation. The hands-on practice will cover data retrieval, software processing and results explanation. The error budget and detection capability will also be discussed. This course will mainly use GMTSAR open source software for manipulating radar images and solving surface displacement. The students will learn the capability and limitation of different SAR products.“
goal.ch: 本課程首先講解SAR基本原理，利用地震造成的地表變形與地層下陷做為實際應用案例，從資料取得、軟體操作至科學解釋完整講述雷達影像操作。課程中將探討SAR影像的監測能力與誤差來源，透過開源軟體(GMTSAR)的實作，理解雷達影像如何量測地表三維形變，並結合其他大地測量資料進行地表變形的模擬，學習如何使用雷達影像並解釋現象。期盼學生能在過程中學習實務操作能力，並正確了解不同遙測技術的使用時機與限制條件。

content.en: “This course includes lecture and hands-on practice. The material covers satellite operation and measurement. The data collected are applied to geophysics and gravity anomaly detection. Data processing, analysis, and adjustment computation are included in hands-on practice with a connection to scientific applications.“
content.ch: 本課程包含原理介紹與資料實作。詳細講授內容包括衛星架構與測量方法，並將其觀測資料應用於地球物理與重力異常偵測。透過實作與理論並行，處理即時資料、統計分析、平差計算並連結科學應用。

textbook.en: “Oliver, C., ＆ Quegan, S. (2004). Understanding synthetic aperture radar images. SciTech Publishing.“

grading.en: “Hands-on practice and assignment: 60％ Quiz: 30％ Oral presentation: 10％“
grading.ch: “實習與作業: 60％ 課堂測驗: 30％ 分組報告:10％“

en.competency: Professional competence in remote sensing and geoinformatics

ch.competency: 遙測與空間資訊專業能力
